ModMetaData.name: HolyWasher (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description: Holy Washer adds the ability for pawns to wash off tainted effect from clothes the "pragmatic" way. No more taint on that apparel! Disclaimer: Requires research and using a wash basin or washing machine. We are not responsible for your colonists profiteering from operating a cannibalist laundromat colony. PACKAGE CONTENTS [Production Building] Wash Basin - allows pawns to wash tainted clothes manually. Requires Basic Washing research. [Production Building] Washing Machine - allows clothes to be washed with electricity without having a pawn to work on it. Requires Advanced Washing research. [Research Topics] Basic Washing, Advanced Washing PACKAGE NOTES Update of sma342, Blacharnias mod for RimWorld 1.1 with OkraDonkey's refactoring work. No longer supports RimWorld 1.0.
